00025 #ifndef L4_SYS_TIMEOUT_H__
00026 #define L4_SYS_TIMEOUT_H__
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/l4int.h>
00029 
00045 typedef struct l4_timeout_s {
00046   l4_uint16_t t;                           
00047 } __attribute__((packed)) l4_timeout_s;
00048 
00049 
00057 typedef union l4_timeout_t {
00058   l4_uint32_t raw;                 
00059   struct
00060   {
00061 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00062     l4_timeout_s snd;              
00063     l4_timeout_s rcv;              
00064 #else
00065     l4_timeout_s rcv;              
00066     l4_timeout_s snd;              
00067 #endif
00068   } p;                             
00069 } l4_timeout_t;
00070 
00071 
00077 #define L4_IPC_TIMEOUT_0 ((l4_timeout_s){0x0400})           
00078 #define L4_IPC_TIMEOUT_NEVER ((l4_timeout_s){0})            
00079 #define L4_IPC_NEVER_INITIALIZER {0}                        
00080 #define L4_IPC_NEVER ((l4_timeout_t){0})                    
00081 #define L4_IPC_RECV_TIMEOUT_0 ((l4_timeout_t){0x00000400})  
00082 #define L4_IPC_SEND_TIMEOUT_0 ((l4_timeout_t){0x04000000})  
00083 #define L4_IPC_BOTH_TIMEOUT_0 ((l4_timeout_t){0x04000400})  
00085 
00086 
00092 enum l4_timeout_abs_validity {
00093   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V1_ms = 0,
00094   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V2_ms,
00095   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V4_ms,
00096   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V8_ms,    /* 5 */
00097   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V16_ms,
00098   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V32_ms,
00099   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V64_ms,
00100   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V128_ms,
00101   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V256_ms,  /* 10 */
00102   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V512_ms,
00103   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V1_s,
00104   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V2_s,
00105   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V4_s,
00106   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V8_s,
00107   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V16_s,
00108   L4_TIMEOUT_ABS_V32_s,
00109 };

00121 l4_timeout_s l4_timeout_rel(unsigned man, unsigned exp) L4_NOTHROW;

00134 l4_timeout_t l4_ipc_timeout(unsigned snd_man, unsigned snd_exp,
00135                             unsigned rcv_man, unsigned rcv_exp) L4_NOTHROW;

00147 l4_timeout_t l4_timeout(l4_timeout_s snd, l4_timeout_s rcv) L4_NOTHROW;

00156 L4_INLINE
00157 void l4_snd_timeout(l4_timeout_s snd, l4_timeout_t *to) L4_NOTHROW;

00167 void l4_rcv_timeout(l4_timeout_s rcv, l4_timeout_t *to) L4_NOTHROW;

00177 L4_INLINE
00178 l4_kernel_clock_t l4_timeout_rel_get(l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW;
00179

00189 L4_INLINE
00190 unsigned l4_timeout_is_absolute(l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW;

00202 l4_kernel_clock_t l4_timeout_get(l4_kernel_clock_t cur, l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW;

00204 
00205 /*
00206  * Implementation
00207  */
00208 
00209 L4_INLINE
00210 l4_timeout_t l4_ipc_timeout(unsigned snd_man, unsigned snd_exp,
00211     unsigned rcv_man, unsigned rcv_exp) L4_NOTHROW
00212 {
00213   l4_timeout_t t;
00214   t.p.snd.t = (snd_man & 0x3ff) | ((snd_exp << 10) & 0x7c00);
00215   t.p.rcv.t = (rcv_man & 0x3ff) | ((rcv_exp << 10) & 0x7c00);
00216   return t;
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 L4_INLINE
00221 l4_timeout_t l4_timeout(l4_timeout_s snd, l4_timeout_s rcv) L4_NOTHROW
00222 {
00223   l4_timeout_t t;
00224   t.p.snd = snd;
00225   t.p.rcv = rcv;
00226   return t;
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 L4_INLINE
00231 void l4_snd_timeout(l4_timeout_s snd, l4_timeout_t *to) L4_NOTHROW
00232 {
00233   to->p.snd = snd;
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 L4_INLINE
00238 void l4_rcv_timeout(l4_timeout_s rcv, l4_timeout_t *to) L4_NOTHROW
00239 {
00240   to->p.rcv = rcv;
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00244 L4_INLINE
00245 l4_timeout_s l4_timeout_rel(unsigned man, unsigned exp) L4_NOTHROW
00246 {
00247   return (l4_timeout_s){(l4_uint16_t)((man & 0x3ff) | ((exp << 10) & 0x7c00))};
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 L4_INLINE
00252 l4_kernel_clock_t l4_timeout_rel_get(l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW
00253 {
00254   if (to.t == 0)
00255     return ~0ULL;
00256   return (l4_kernel_clock_t)(to.t & 0x3ff) << ((to.t >> 10) & 0x1f);
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 L4_INLINE
00261 unsigned l4_timeout_is_absolute(l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW
00262 {
00263   return to.t & 0x8000;
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 L4_INLINE
00268 l4_kernel_clock_t l4_timeout_get(l4_kernel_clock_t cur, l4_timeout_s to) L4_NOTHROW
00269 {
00270   if (l4_timeout_is_absolute(to))
00271     return 0; /* We cannot retrieve the value ... */
00272   else
00273     return cur + l4_timeout_rel_get(to);
00274 }

L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
